Name: Medical Record Location
Description: Notes that this location is a valid identifier location for an identifier that references a paper medical record

Name: Archives Location
Description: A location that serves as an archives for storing medical records

Name: Identifier Assignment Location
Description: A location that that can be associated with a patient identifier

Name: Login Location
Description: When a user logs in and chooses a session location, they may only choose one with this tag

Name: Visit Location
Description: Visits are only allowed to happen at locations tagged with this location tag or at locations that descend from a location tagged with this tag.

Name: Admission Location
Description: Patients may only be admitted to inpatient care in a location with this tag

Name: Transfer Location
Description: Patients may only be transfer to inpatient care in a location with this tag

Name: Consult Note Location
Description: A location where a consult note can be written

Name: Surgery Note Location
Description: A location where a surgery note can be written

Name: ED Note Location
Description: A location where an ED note can be written

Name: Admission Note Location
Description: A location where an Admission note can be written

Name: Dispensing Location
Description: A location where a pharmacist or pharmacist aide can dispensed medication.

Name: Appointment Location
Description: Signifies a Location where appointments can be scheduled

Name: Vitals Location
Description: Signifies a Location where the vitals app and note should be available

Name: Inpatients App Location
Description: Signifies a Location where the inpatients app should be available

Name: Check-In Location
Description: Signifies a Location where the check-in app and form should be available

Name: Registration Location
Description: Signifies a Location where the registration app should be available

Name: Registration and Check-In Location
Description: Signifies a Location where the combined registration/check-in app should be available

Name: Order Radiology Study Location
Description: Signifies a Location where a radiology study can be ordered

Name: Oncology Consult Location
Description: Signifies a Location where oncology consult and intake forms can be filled out

Name: Chemotherapy Location
Description: Signifies a Location where chemotherapy is performed, and therefore a chemotherapy treament note can be filled out

Name: NCD Consult Location
Description: Signifies a Location where NCD consult form can be filled out

Name: HIV Consult Location
Description: Signifies a Location where HIV consult form can be filled out

Name: Primary Care Consult Location
Description: Signifies a Location where primary care consult form can be filled out

Name: Lab Results Location
Description: Signifies a Location where a Lab Results form can be filled out

Name: ED Triage Location
Description: Signifies a Location where an ED Triage form can be filled out

Name: Maternal and Child Location
Description: Signifies Locations where Maternal and Child health is provided

Name: Vaccination Location
Description: Signifies Locations where Vaccinations are provided (beyond MCH, NCD, Primary care)

Name: Mental Health Location
Description: Signifies Locations where Mental Health is provided

Name: COVID-19 Location
Description: Signifies Locations for COVID-19 triage, care, and treatment

Name: Tablet Entry Location
Description: Location where entry is done via tablet; used to enable the 'simple' registration flow

Name: Program Location
Description: Patient programs options are limited to the locations tagged with this tag.

Name: Health Facility Location
Description: Signifies Locations that represent Health Facilities

Name: Labs Component Location
Description: Signifies Locations where the Labs component should be enabled
